title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
OB: When setting a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com', the title of the hyperlink builder dynamically changes with the settings. It displays the incorrect title instead of 'Hyperlink Options'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain constant as 'Hyperlink Options' regardless of the hyperlink settings. It should not dynamically change based on the entered hyperlink.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Observe the title of the hyperlink builder during and after the hyperlink setup.
